organizations: National Soccer Coaches Association of America/Adidas
lead_paragraph: TEAM In Manhattan, Martin Luther King Jr. High School’s boys team (13-0-3) was ranked No. 1 in the country last week in the National Soccer Coaches Association of America/Adidas poll. Since 1994, M.L.K., coached by Martin Jacobson, has a 272-14-9 record.
